General.Name: Ordissimo
General.Description: Ordissimo SA designs, develops, and markets technological solutions for laptops and desktops, tablets, and smartphones in France, Germany, Belgium, Switzerland, and internationally. The company provides printers; and accessories, such as hard drives, mouse products, protective covers flip covers for smartphones, and screen cleaners for PC and smartphone. Ordissimo SA was founded in 2002 and is based in Montrouge, France.

1.Name: Mr. Christophe Berly de Buigne
1.Title: Director of Sales & Marketing and Director
